title: Verify a Large Check Deposit
description: A customer has deposited a large, out-of-state check, and the bank needs to place a hold on the funds for verification.

tasks.description: Identify the large check deposit in the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the $25,000 check deposit from an out-of-state bank.

tasks.description: Based on bank policy, place a standard hold on the deposited funds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent places a 7-day hold on the funds.

tasks.description: Notify the customer about the hold, explaining the reason and the date the funds will be available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the hold policy and fund availability date to the customer.
